summary: This bill, the 'Accountability for Terrorist Perpetrators of October 7th Act,' mandates sanctions against the Popular Resistance Committees (PRC) and associated entities for their involvement in terrorist attacks, including the October 7th attacks on Israel. It requires the President to block property, restrict visas, and revoke existing visas of individuals connected to the PRC. The bill also calls for a report on the designation of Lions' Den and the PRC as Specially Designated Global Terrorists and Foreign Terrorist Organizations.
